frontmatter.title: Random variable
frontmatter.description: generative interactive installation and giclee prints

projectData.task: To reflect on the relationship between reflexivity and contingency by creating a generative algorithm producing pleasing abstract works and exhibit it.
projectData.whyExists: The project uses generative algorithm written in p5.js that defines color palettes, shapes and direction of their movement for each time the program runs. An installation lets visitors create their own artworks like these.
